item.title: Read-only user in PostgreSQL
item.description: Create only read only with limited access to PostgreSQL Database. This user can only SELECT table data and also restricted by schema access.

item.title: Monitor Logs in Real-Time with “Log.io” on CentOS 6/7
item.description:
Log.io is a small simple but effective application build on top of Node.js and Socket.io, which allows to monitor Linux servers log files in real time through web interface screen widgets.
